Variables.StringVar: A long time ago, the first settlers were hoping to turn this land into a place flourishing with trade.
But then darkness overwhelmed the new settlements and shattered the people's dreams.
Malus, the god of shadows, had sent his minions to steal the torches from the people.
Unable to cross the many bridges which were connecting the market towns, the trade routes collapsed within days.
Years and generations passed without change.
But there may yet be hope...
